name: cs720-platform
description: Customer Intelligence Platform for Sales Engineers - Modular Architecture

scripts.dev: concurrently -n "BACKEND,PROXY,AI,FRONTEND" -c "blue,magenta,green,cyan" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:proxy" "npm run dev:ai" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend && npm run build:proxy && npm run build:ai && npm run build:frontend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:shared && npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:proxy && npm run clean:ai && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.start: concurrently -n "BACKEND,PROXY,AI" -c "blue,magenta,green" "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:proxy" "npm run start:ai"

author: CS720 Team
